title: How-To: Add a single field to groupBy() results
description:
Use groupBy() with collect() to keep one additional field (or set of values) attached
to your grouped results. This is useful when you want to see a key metric by host or
file, but also preserve which domains, users, or other attributes were seen per group.

examples.name: Collect DomainName per ComputerName/FileName pair
examples.description: Groups by ComputerName and FileName while collecting all DomainName values seen in that group.
